@nofish , in ZeroHello Newsfeed press space should not run into focus of search box. Space works like  `PgDn` in most browsers, I believe users would like to use space to view Newsfeed up to down. fix: [this line of code](https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroHello/blob/7eeb4598e7ae1b63dd8907da18b6ee56dc63fc7e/js/FeedList.coffee#L67) should be `if e.charCode? and e.charCode == 0 or e.charCode == 32`

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GrEenUGRWnzaNZjR3XsQa6dQgdPDTyt7i Green hub is up! And it is the default one in ZeroMe instead of Red hub. You will miss something if you do not seed it. If you don't believe it, please see http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/content.json And anyone from Green hub? Tell me!

after some tests with new version Rev1413,  I found:
- serving 300+ zites over clearnet -> OK
- serving 10+  zites under tor always mode -> OK
- serving 300+ zites under tor always mode  -> some problems mention [here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:8_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/+nofish+There+are+long+time+painful+things+using+ZeroNet+under+Tor+always+mode)

So, can ZeroNet control Tor to deal with many connections more nicely? ( stream isolation, more socks port, more Guard node...)
Hub feature, reducing the needed number of connections, is important under Tor always mode. Thus, can we easily tell someone to run his/her own hub? Obviously, more hubs more connections. Then we run into the [previous discussion]( http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:7_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/Recent+ZeroMe+structure+is+bad+for+hub+migrating+and+censorship+proof+My+idea+is) which is worthy of thinking again.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Create+profile 这个地址是新的ZeroMe用户才点的！老用户千万不要点里面的Join！！（Never click `Join` if you have been a ZeroMe user!!）有些用户信息混乱丢失，就是因为乱点！乱点后就会重置一些信息！ZeroMe老用户换电脑登录时，如果没有自动登录，可以点`Select user to post new content`，选择自己的ZeroID，然后千万不要点`Create new profile`，而应等待进度条走完，然后按F5刷新就已登录了。我亲测可行！等会儿加入论坛置顶贴。乱点的后果自负！
在[ZeroMe首页](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit)，右上角有三个点，点击以后出现Follow username mentions和Follow comments on your posts，点击打勾后，可以在ZeroHello首页Newsfeed看到别人@你和回复你帖子的提醒。
ZeroMe编辑评论时，按Tab+Enter发送，不需要鼠标点`SAVE`

【紧急通知】ZeroNet的新版0.4.1已经推送，大幅修正漏洞，大幅优化，所有人应立即升级ZeroNet，[升级方法](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Nse6WcodQ5Mj6ZwvZvuyCVvQESwuxbCUy/?Topic:10_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ)

好消息！[据报道](http://www.ibtimes.co.uk/zeronet-revolutionary-new-decentralised-p2p-internet-post-edward-snowden-world-1580897)，并经过[他本人确认](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj/1473695005)，ZeroNet作者获得[Blue Systems](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blue_Systems)资助，全职开发ZeroNet。这下子ZeroNet的后续开发就有保证了，不会因为各种原因停滞。Blue Systems是个德国富二代拥有的，专门资助自由软件，是KDE的主要资助者。（天朝的富二代们怎么跟人家差距这么大？）
ZeroNet作者的Optional files improvements计划，在ZeroMe增加图片分享功能 https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/issues/584

I LOVE [ZeroMe "Plus"](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/)
推荐一下 [@talnicrom](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/talnicrom@zeroid.bit) 搞的 [ZeroMe "Plus"](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/) ，相比原版增加了话题（如 [#ZeroMePlus](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Hashtags&tag=ZeroMePlus)）、拉黑、调整评论显示顺序、一键分享站点等功能。开发很活跃，有什么想法可以用英文跟 [@talnicrom](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/talnicrom@zeroid.bit) 提。（ZeroNet作者更专注于核心功能开发，前端界面的小优化还是要靠其他开发者）。一开始进去时点`Grant`，然后要耐心等一会才会显示帖子（建立数据库时页面空白）。

继续推荐一下 [@talnicrom](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/talnicrom@zeroid.bit) 搞的 [ZeroMe "Plus"](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/) ，这两天又增加了用户页显示Likes列表功能（部分替代转发功能），以及点击显示图片功能（作者的[演示](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Post/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/1475170734)，语法就是普通markdown的贴图语法）。 ZeroMe "Plus"的用法见我上一条推。

继续推荐一下 [@talnicrom](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/?Profile/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/talnicrom@zeroid.bit) 搞的 [ZeroMe "Plus"](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/) ，这几天又增加了Tooltip功能，即鼠标悬停在Activity feed里的某条，能够显示对应帖子/留言的更多内容。ZeroMe "Plus"的用法见我上上条推。
作者说ZeroNet 0.5 准备出来了，支持ZeroMe原生传图
发现一些用户的系统时间不准，导致在ZeroNet里显示评论顺序混乱。请检查自己的系统时间，最好设置成与对时服务器自动同步。系统时间不准可以破坏匿名性，是一个指纹，可以把你的不同身份关联起来。这也是Whonix里有专门的对时机制的原因，那个对时机制能随机加入微小的时间偏差，消除该指纹。
Everyone下的时间线和Activity feed长时间被中文占满了，再这样下去感觉老外会疯。估计不久就要像论坛一样克隆出一套ZeoMeCN，给中文用户自嗨。

今天白天的时候大家讨论得很热烈啊，关于自己理想中的网络社区。我刚才看了下，还没时间完全看完，就先收藏了几位的帖子有时间再看。大家相互交流，观点的碰撞，是极好的。大方向大家基本是统一的，具体的东西我建议是走一步看一步，因为经常是计划赶不上变化。经历过一些事后，自己的观点都会有变化。比如说之前ZeroNet作者说ZeroMe的老帖子会把hub撑大，要提供一键删除旧贴功能，让用户自己删，否则达到空间限额后发不了贴他不会帮提限额了。我当时强烈建议他用optional files来存旧贴，他当时说optional files有缺点啊，会搞得太复杂啊，不想搞啊。大概两个月后，也就是前几天，他就在github的某issue里说，新版本的改进版optional files可以用来存旧贴。

中文翻译已经全面上线（**需要手动更新到最新版才能看到**），ZeroHello、ZeroTalk、ZeroMe都上线了中文翻译（感谢 @lmath ）。根据作者的设计意图，ZeroNet能根据操作系统语言设置或浏览器语言设置**自动**调整语言设置，也就是说大多数用户是不需要手动设置语言的。实际情况怎样，需要大家测试反馈。另外此次翻译提交的语言代码是zh，简体和繁体应该是在语言代码有区分的，操作系统语言设置或浏览器语言设置在简体和繁体区分上分别用的什么语言代码？

带来一个好消息和~~坏消息~~。好消息我已经成功地利用 [buildozer](http://buildozer.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installation.html) 编译出ZeroNet的APK，成功运行并且能看部分网站。~~坏消息是另一部分网站始终打不开（log显示 content.json `Hash Failed`，但明明找到了很多节点，挂不挂VPN都一样），我怀疑是python-for-android 的python版本太老（2.7.2），ZeroNet与之不兼容。（怀疑是msgpack没弄好~~，旧版toolchain要写成msgpack而不是msgpack-python）真实原因在[这里](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/1483450432)。我又试了新版toolchain（命令是`buildozer -v android_new debug`），在各种版本系统上编译出来都运行闪退，~~没有什么有价值的log~~（log要搜`python`，闪退原因是sqlite3居然在blacklist.txt没有被自动去除），怀疑是新版toolchain不稳定，可以参见gihub上的issue。
（EDIT：还可以利用[官方提供的虚拟机镜像构建的编译环境](https://kivy.org/docs/guide/packaging-android-vm.html#kivy-android-vm)，大家可以去尝试。在PC上试过python2.7.2和老版本依赖，也试过禁用openssl和encryption，无问题
EDIT2：成功打包并发布，见[这里](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/1483720921)）

我的折腾历程：

- 按照[文档](http://buildozer.readthedocs.io/en/latest/installation.html) 方法安装buildozer及必须的工具（文档页面里有按照不同系统版本给出，Ubuntu16跟15一样，除了openjdk-7-jdk从7改成8，建议用Ubuntu16）
- 用一个新解压的干净的ZeroNet文件夹，把里面的zeronet.py改名为main.py，然后根据[文档](http://buildozer.readthedocs.io/en/latest/quickstart.html)所说的进入到刚才新的ZeroNet文件夹，在这里打开终端，并运行`buildozer init`
-  上一步的命令在ZeroNet文件夹自动生成buildozer.spec文件，用文本编辑器编辑，这个很关键。我修改的地方有`source.include_exts =`、`requirements = sqlite3,openssl,pyopenssl,gevent,msgpack-python,pil,hostpython2,kivy`（旧版toolchain的应为`requirements = sqlite3,openssl,pyopenssl,gevent,msgpack,pil,hostpython,kivy`，建议用新版）、`orientation = portrait`、`android.permissions = INTERNET`、`log_level = 2`，这样改不一定完全正确，大家可以多尝试。
- 接着就是自动编译了，编译过程会自动下载安装依赖，特别是连上google下载xml文件，所以需要翻墙，最好是VPN。不想用VPN的话，可以在自动下载安装好android SDK后（把DNS改成114.114.114.114后多试几次可满速下载SDK），在`$HOME/.buildozer/android/platform/android-sdk-20/tools`文件夹下双击运行android文件（确保它有可执行权限），在弹出窗口中选择菜单栏的Tools->Options，就可以设置HTTP代理。（找不到菜单的话，可以google搜`android sdk proxy setting`，用配置文件法搞定。）然后继续在上一步的终端里运行`buildozer -v android_new debug logcat >buildozer.log`开始自动编译（要想用老的toolchain需要运行`buildozer -v android debug logcat >buildozer.log`）。如果出现提示依赖缺失或者版本太老，就手动装上吧；如果报错，copy错误关键句子到google搜索，应该能找到解决方法。最最坑的地方在于，buildozer在新版toolchain不会自动把sqlite3从`ZeroNet/.buildozer/android/platform/build/dist/your_app_name/blacklist.txt` 和 `ZeroNet/.buildozer/android/platform/build/dist/your_app_name/build/blacklist.txt` 里去除，需要手动删掉sqlite3相关的那几行（通常在文件最底部），保存文件。然后再运行一次`buildozer -v android_new debug logcat >buildozer.log`，就会把sqlite3打包进去。（谁去给buildozer提issue啊，我查资料说这个sqlite3问题已经解决，怎么还有？）
- 如果编译顺利完成，会在ZeroNet文件夹下多出个bin文件夹，APK就躺在里面，复制到手机上安装吧
- 使用说明
 - 你手机上有什么防火墙或者权限控制的东东，记得给本APK放行。
 - 由于本APK并没有设计什么界面，所以打开后一会就出现Loading，就不会动了。
 - 这时不要慌，按home键回到桌面，打开浏览器，输入 http://127.0.0.1:43110/ 进入，正常的话就能看见熟悉的ZeroNet界面了（碰到各种奇葩问题换浏览器试试）

@nofish, I just can't believe how tricky it is! Remember I said when I was packaging android  APK of ZeroNet I found `Hash failed` time to time? I finally found that it is due to `modified` field in content.json , which is a timestamp, but under android it sometimes adds 0.0000001 to the timestamp, causing the damn error! I spent so much time to find it! So, how to deal with it? I think you need to change the python code. IMO the  `modified` field should be dealt with as a string rather than Real number. After shooting it, we'll have APK of ZeroNet!!

趁现在来讨论一下新论坛的版规吧。先来几个Q&A
- Q：为什么要有版规？老论坛不是没有吗？
A：因为老论坛是当时xiaolan随手建立的，那时中文用户极少，论坛是实验性质的，没有具体的未来考虑。论坛建立不久xiaolan就隐退了。后来随着中文用户增多，什么样的帖子都有，但唯一有管理权限的xiaolan已经隐退，也就无所谓了。这也直接导致了最近的老论坛被恶意刷屏。
版规不仅能维持论坛秩序，而且能降低论坛管理人员和用户的风险。ZeroNet的定位不是一个匿名工具，私密性和隐匿性不足，这是为了性能和浏览体验不得不舍弃的。所以有些内容会给论坛管理人员和用户带来风险，比如儿童色情、毒品、军火、恐怖主义等等。这些内容在世界上绝大多数国家都是高风险的。
- Q：私密性和隐匿性不足具体是指？
A：存储内容没有加密，在默认情况下没有全程走Tor，并且用户可以使用任意浏览器，绝大多数浏览器都有各种信息泄露风险。当然用户可以使用一些措施加密、加固，但是门槛较高，对大多数用户来说是不现实的。
- Q：私密性和隐匿性不足是不是ZeroNet就没有什么价值了？
A：当然不是。除去那些高风险内容后，普通浏览用户并没有很高风险。敏感信息的发帖用户和论坛管理人员的风险会高一些，但是可以用一些措施加密、加固。毕竟这两类人占比小，容易普及加密、加固技术。
- Q：论坛管理人员的风险有多高？
A：除去那些高风险内容后，论坛管理人员的风险应该不会很高，毕竟在ZeroNet上建站成本几乎为零，可以克隆出无数个论坛，搞定论坛管理人员并没有多大意义。但是如果没有除去那些高风险内容，万一碰上NSA、FBI这些，他们的黑科技很多，加密、加固恐怕都防不住。
- Q：有版规之后会对言论自由有限制？
A：正如之前所述，不可能没有任何限制，但是版规和论坛管理人员应该保证：在无国界的ZeroNet上，中文用户能享有达到国际通行标准或者说联合国标准的言论自由权利。

有什么意见，欢迎提出。

论坛迁移教程，内含ZeroNet原理干货
- 原中文论坛被恶意刷屏，站长xiaolan却处于隐退状态，为了保持用户体验，社区绝大多数人要求迁移论坛。本次论坛迁移即将完成，但恐怕很少人知道其原理。这里面涉及到ZeroNet本质的原理，很多人没理解透（官方文档也没讲透），那么借这个机会我试着讲述一番，权当抛砖引玉（同时也要感谢各位对迁移的支持和配合）
- 我一句话总结ZeroNet本质的原理就是，基于公私钥验证的权限分层管理的分布式文件系统。公私钥验证就是比特币相关的，不细说了。分布式就是没有中心节点，分散在网络中，也容易理解。权限分层管理的文件系统却很多人未能看透的，简单的说就是最高权限者拥有整个文件夹的写入权限，次权限者拥有子文件夹的写入权限，最低权限者只拥有孙文件夹的写入权限。ZeroNet就是在此基础上，不同层级的文件夹放入不同类型的文件，做出分层结构的多用户网站
- 明白了以上的东西，迁移论坛方法就容易想到了。（后记：先以单用户签名发布不是必要的，你可以直接到最后一步：把论坛用户的文件一一（one by one）签名发布。但是考虑到是tor always模式下签名发布，而且文件数量很多，先以单用户发布出去其他节点配合复制做种，能够提高效率。）我先clone旧论坛，再把新论坛的整个论坛从多用户改为单用户（相当于我个人网站），在本地从旧论坛文件夹copy数据到新论坛文件夹，然后全站签名发布。同时让其他网友在其本地从旧论坛文件夹copy数据到新论坛文件夹，他们就帮我做种了，理想情况下可以瞬间同步好。此时新论坛里所有论坛用户的数据都已经发布到网络上，并受到各节点承认（只不过看成我个人的数据）。接着我把新论坛的整个论坛改回多用户，把论坛用户的文件一一签名（inner_path签名方式，具体后面说），此时虽然留的是我的签名（最高权限），但是这些数据的性质变成了各个用户自己的数据。
- 具体的细节操作：权限分层管理的文件系统是由一个个在不同层级文件夹的content.json来实现的，所以对其的理解成为重点。最上层的content.json成为root content.json，对它签名只需要拉开隐藏菜单，点开`这是我的站点`，最下面的框默认content.json（没有前缀路径就是root content.json），点`签名`即对它签名。请注意，所谓对它签名其实是把该content.json对应层级的文件SHA512 hash后将hash值写入该content.json，而不是对content.json本身签名，所以哪怕content.json不存在也可对它签名；若修改了其他文件，不是对其他文件签名，而仍然是对content.json签名。这里很容易理解偏差。
对root content.json签名自然就是对全站签名，等效的命令行操作不需要加--inner_path，`python ./zeronet.py siteSign site_address content.json`（能用前面所述的网页操作签名就用，不建议用命令行）。root content.json有两处关键设置：ignore和includes，这两者结合起来的意思是，ignore下放某个子文件夹某部分的写入权限，includes把这部分权限交给下一层的content.json来具体描述。修改这两者就可以在单用户网站和多用户网站之间切换。我把ignore里的data/users/.*/.*改成data/users/.*/content.json，includes字段及其内容删除，网站就从多用户变为单用户个人网站，把data/users/anyone/data.json全部当作个人网站数据签名发布出去。
- 再经过我之前说的那些步骤，节点们都同步到了以个人网站数据形式发布的论坛所有用户数据，此时，就需要把新论坛的整个论坛改回多用户，操作方式是把root content.json的ignore和includes改回原来的样子，签名发布。然后设置data/users/content.json，加入需要屏蔽的恶意帐号，对data/users/content.json签名，在网页上的操作方法跟之前类似，只不过需要注意在最下面的框的上边点击选择data/users/content.json。等效的命令行操作**需要**加--inner_path，`python ./zeronet.py siteSign site_address --inner_path content.json`（记住，只要不是root content.json，就要加 --inner_path ）
- 最后一步把论坛用户的文件一一（one by one）签名，也是inner_path签名方式，因为文件数量太多，不可能手动完成，感谢 @12hlearn [提供了自动脚本](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1KNmG5rJUGhgUJGFbLkv2B5isaqu9PrZqi/1CwbqLCD6TdkinNNNb4GneZxbsoJ6Mw6oE/1484558740)。此时虽然留的是我的签名（最高权限），但是这些数据的性质变成了各个用户自己的数据。为了提高签名发布效率，可以先不带--publish参数全部签名好，开一个节点做种。同时另一个节点一一（one by one）签名发布，可以把ZeroNet的源码改一下，里面的超时时间改小。最后再开一个节点把数据下载下来，用文件夹对比工具来对比看看有没有数据缺失，缺失的手动签名发布。

@Nofish: I think I found one cause of some files _**never**_ being updated unless deleting the site and re-downloading site. This issue exits for a long time, see 
[my long-ago post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:8_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/+nofish+There+are+long+time+painful+things+using+ZeroNet+under+Tor+always+mode).
For instance, in the P2P network, `ZeroNet/data/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/data/users/content.json`  's  `"modified": 1484782142,` but in one of my node the log says Site: 1oranG...4k9v Try to get listModifications from peers:  [xxxxxxxxxxxxxx] since: 1485xxxxxx. Obviously, 1485xxxxxx  > 1484782142, so the data/users/content.json will never be updated unless deleting the site and re-downloading the site.
When using some unstable network connection (e.g. Tor, mobile cellular data ) we can easily be annoyed by this issue. 
IMO, we need a command `Update all files` in ⋮ menu and hidden sidebar of every site, also, a command `Update all files of all sites`  in the main ⋮ menu in ZeroHello.

@Nofish: The issues mentioned in [my long-ago post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:8_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ/+nofish+There+are+long+time+painful+things+using+ZeroNet+under+Tor+always+mode) are not totally solved, especially using some unstable network connection (e.g. Tor, mobile cellular data ). With growing number of zites, extensive and deep optimizing is need.
- One of my suggestions is:
( in FileServer.py, see the lines marked `Added by @P2P` )
I pasted my updated code [here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/17iF64gTLycSohUSJsFyq7FMYsQfMqghJa/?13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ_24), including many test & optimizing in Tor always mode, I hope it's helpful.
- Another of my suggestions is: group a random part of serving zites into one .onion instead of one zite one .onion to reduce overhead of Tor CPU consuming and Tor network. In my node  serving hundreds of zites, Tor process is always consuming 100% of one of my CPU's cores, and the Tor becomes much slower than normal, almost unusable. So I suggest grouping several  bunches of zites into several .onions to reduce the number of .onions. To address privacy concern, we can make the bunch random, changing every time ZeroNet starts.

讨论一下传统中心化C/S架构的框架/应用移植到ZeroNet的可能性及难度。暂时只讨论python写的框架/应用，比如django框架，基于它有很多论坛engine、CMS等应用，理论上移植了django框架就能移植一大票应用。当然，django只是一个Python建站框架，还有很多框架，在此先讨论思路。
我们应该往最轻松最优雅的hack方式去想。我的思路是每个节点同时跑ZeroNet和django，在运行于本地的django和浏览器之间，用Python做个反代，把浏览器任何发送给django的更改（比如站长修改设置、用户发帖等）看成一个个commit，反代在代理的同时把一个个commit（弄成json形式）传给ZeroNet（可通过ZeroFrame）签名发布出去。当然django本身的用户验证机制要去掉，由ZeroNet通过签名来验证。从P2P网络上收到别人的json，验证通过后commit给django。大家看看怎样？ @12h Study: @Lmath: @Linker:

@Nofish: Some users reported that they lost their data (e.g. cloned site's privatekey stored in users.json, data.json of NewGFWTalk.bit). I read some code, IMO probably the cause is in ZeroNet's code no `with` when opening a file in read mode.
 However,
>It is good practice to use the with keyword when dealing with file objects.
```
>>> with open('workfile', 'r') as f:

...     read_data = f.read()
>>> f.closed

True
```
even if mode is read according to https://docs.python.org/2/tutorial/inputoutput.html#methods-of-file-objects
And discussion: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9831097/is-open-read-safe
And everyone in stackoverflow uses `with` when reading json file:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2835559/parsing-values-from-a-json-file-using-python
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/20199126/reading-json-from-a-file
So IMO in User.py `def save` and in SiteStorage.py `def open`,  `def read` should have `with` when reading json file in case of something unexpected happening.
Of course, there are many other open() without `with`, but they are not as urgent as above three ones. I know you are busy now,  you can fix other less urgent ones after you finish your TED talk:)

@Nofish: There is a very big problem in distributions of ZeroNet. I don't know much about mac, so I'll take ZeroNet-win as an example. In ZeroNet-win, the exe is signed, but the zeronet's py code is not. The signed exe means most antivirus softwares will trust ZeroNet.exe and let it go. But what if someone evil take ZeroNet.exe, replace zeronet's py code with malicious code, repack it, and advertise it to let people download? At the beginning, antivirus softwares still let it go, resulting in users cracked. With many users affected, updated antivirus softwares will blacklist ZeroNet.exe, which damages both user experience and ZeroNet image.
So my suggestion is to make a loader into the ZeroNet.exe. The laoder will verify PGP signature of ZeroNet's py code and then import. For details pls see both the 2 answers in this link:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/21122426/pgp-gpg-signed-python-code
For better security, probably you need to revoke the current ZeroNet.exe's cert after you finish the new one with a good verifying mechanism. 
PS: Both ZeroNet-win and ZeroNet-mac 's py code are not updated, you forgot it?

@frog: hub是方便管理，以及去中心化。你的观点有一定的参考性。我的idea：
- 所有用户文件夹内都加一个ping.json
- 除了ping.json以外，其他全部是optional files
- ping.json里存放该用户对哪些人评论过、@过（统称为ping过）
- 当有人ping过你，你就下载Ta的data.json（当然，你fo的和你like的，自然也会下载其data.json）
- 一个hub里，只有所有的ping.json是必须下载的，大大减少了所需空间和首次加载时间，并且不丢失社交网络的特性。

EDIT：为了方便看你fo人的po下评论，还应该下载ping过Ta的人的data.json

@Nofish: it's expected  result. Some users have tried to use chroot ( e.g. GNURoot Debian )  to run ZeroNet on their android phones, with no problems. But under native android, there is the problem as I said. So different system libs and different compiler may have different result, even on the same phone! As we know, Android 8, 9 10 ... are coming, no one know whether it would affect on them and how heavily affect. So I'd recommend auto-detect at least for Android.  The  "565 check" is unreliable.
@Nofish: By the way, have you tried to install my released APK on your RemixOS Player? runing  OK?

@Nofish: But without you using ZeroNet on android, we have problems hard to solve,e.g. SSL does not work on android even openssl and pyopenssl packed. Also,  no GUI of the APK currently, we should find a way to let kivy GUI and ZeroNet work at the same time. ( kivy GUI is event driven, if python enters ZeroNet's loop the kivy GUI is frozen.)

@Nofish: 
- copying cert is **_not_** friendly to new comers. 
- And we need more arguments like` --pri_dir` to specify path of private and sensitive info directory.  These private and sensitive info  ( e.g. users.json, sites.json, \*.pem, some db, some zites' data) should be under private directory of ZeroNet APK, where other apps on the phone can not access. But the space for private directory  is very limited, so we should not store **all** data in private directory, many zites' s data should be stored out of private directory, maybe using  `--pub_dir`.
- whether starting ZeroNet to separate process uses much more RAM, still to be tested.

@Lmath: 我找到原因了，在zeronet的代码里搜`ctypes.util.find_library('crypto')`还能找到一些其他的代码没有patch过。根本原因是上游 https://github.com/kivy/python-for-android/blob/master/pythonforandroid/recipes/python2/patches/ctypes-find-library-updated.patch#L15 以及 https://github.com/kivy/python-for-android/blob/master/pythonforandroid/recipes/python2/patches/ctypes-find-library.patch#L16 没有考虑到运行外部存储的py的情况。同一个函数os.path.abspath('./')在Android 6很可能有不同的输出（/storage上）。并且Android 6模拟器看到的环境变量出现/data/user/0/...这样的，也可能造成find_library的不确定性。所以谁去上游提issue？我的建议是利用os.environ['ANDROID_PRIVATE']类似的环境变量，而且用rsplit从右边切，例如os.environ['ANDROID_PRIVATE'].rsplit('/', 1)[0] 
EDIT： 还有个问题，[这一行](https://github.com/kivy/python-for-android/blob/master/pythonforandroid/recipes/python2/patches/ctypes-find-library-updated.patch#L23)，既然是在/system/lib里找了，为什么又返回lib_search + os.path.sep + filename，而不是 "/system/lib" + os.path.sep + filename

I suggest using SQLite's feature e.g. Online Backup API to improve robustness.

@Nofish: Is zeronet's SQLite in rollback mode which supports atomic commit? Anyway, it should rebuild db automatically on  error instead of refusing to run (need a notification to inform user the db is being rebuilt).

@Nofish: On android I see `Db: (version:3.15.1, API: 2.6.0)`. synchronous = OFF and journal_mode = MEMORY is very dangerous, now I'm not surprised the db corrupted. Would you explain what are `Transaction    With (1M)    Without (10k)`? I think default setting of sqlite is ought to be fast.

@Nofish: 
>Actually, SQLite will easily do 50,000 or more INSERT statements per second on an average desktop computer. But it will only do a few dozen transactions per second. Transaction speed is limited by the rotational speed of your disk drive. A transaction normally requires two complete rotations of the disk platter, which on a 7200RPM disk drive limits you to about 60 transactions per second.
>Transaction speed is limited by disk drive speed because (by default) SQLite actually waits until the data really is safely stored on the disk surface before the transaction is complete. That way, if you suddenly lose power or if your OS crashes, your data is still safe. For details, read about atomic commit in SQLite..
>By default, each INSERT statement is its own transaction. But if you surround multiple INSERT statements with BEGIN...COMMIT then all the inserts are grouped into a single transaction. The time needed to commit the transaction is amortized over all the enclosed insert statements and so the time per insert statement is greatly reduced.
>Another option is to run PRAGMA synchronous=OFF. This command will cause SQLite to not wait on data to reach the disk surface, which will make write operations appear to be much faster. But if you lose power in the middle of a transaction, your database file might go corrupt. 

https://www.sqlite.org/faq.html#q19

Obviously, if we want to insert many pieces of data in a short time,  we should group multiple INSERT statements into a single transaction, by which we can speedup a lot.

@Nofish: I spent the whole day test & optimizing, I found needConnections() still has issues:
- pex is slow in Tor always mode, for example, sometimes, even ZeroMail takes 24min to finish the pex and give the thread to next zite ( next zite is blue hub, only takes 26s to finish the pex ). So we need time-out mechanism of pex for needConnections().
- the loop inside needConnections() does not break even though the zite got more than 5 connected peers from OTHER sources. That's, the `connected = len(self.getConnectedPeers())` should be also inside the loop.
- IMO in needConnections() we need tracker peering before pex, which is faster than pex.
- connected_limit does not work, I can see in /Stats page some zites gets 20+ peers while many zites get 0.

@Nofish: I'm afraid ZeroNet is very different from most Win softwares. ZeroNet is opensourced and written in Python, so ZeroNet exposes everything to cracker. As comparison, most Win softwares are closesourced and compiled to binary, making it not that easy to find the right place to inject malicious code. If I am a cracker, I'll definitely choose ZeroNet.exe  as a malicious code carrier because it's extremely easy to write code that can bypass antivirus software to do anything I want to do. Actually Microsoft signs its dlls, as well as some big companies. What ZeroNet lacks is not only signed external resources (only important part is enough IMO, e.g. py/pyd files, openssl.exe...) but also a build-in verifying mechanism.

@Nofish: To inject malicous code to dlls and make it work is not that easy. Injecting py files is much more easier. Of course, python.exe itself can not be marked as virus, but it does not mean antivirus softwares will totally trust it, because everyone knows it is a interpreter. I guess antivirus softwares will keep a eye on python.exe while it is running. But ZeroNet.exe is signed, so antivirus softwares likely trust it totally.(FYI python.exe is not signed)

@Jayofthezero: I can't agree with you. If open-source projects do it in right way, the problem does not exist. For C/C++ and other compiled binaries, if the exe and dlls are signed and verify the dlls before loading them, it is not easy to do evil things. Yes you can modify the code but you can't sign the binaries using official certs. Antivirus softwares will not trust your modified binaries. For python and other interpreted code, we have to do it in similar way. You can't ensure everyone download from official sources, and people who know nothing about ZeroNet are even affected because the cracker would just use ZeroNet.exe as a carrier to bypass antivirus softwares.

@12hlearn: C:\Program Files\mongodb 下建立Data文件夹 C:\Program Files\mongodb\data ,然后分别建立db,log两个文件夹，至此mongodb下有以下文件夹

C:\Program Files\mongodb\bin

C:\Program Files\mongodb\data\db

C:\Program Files\mongodb\data\log

在log文件夹下创建一个日志文件MongoDB.log，即C:\Program Files\mongodb\data\log\MongoDB.log完成以上工作后，你为奇怪为什么要建立这些文件夹（因为，Mongodb安装需要这些文件夹，默认安装是不用创建，但是文件都为安装到C:\data\下）
